item.title: Phaser auto completion in Atom
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: This little guide will show you how to use the tern-phaser plugin by Angelo with Atom. Installing tern This first part explains how to get npm, install tern and the tern-phaser plugin. The first thing that you need to ensure is that you have Node.js installed on your computer. You can download it on https://nodejs.org/en/. This will give you access to npm as well, a handy package manager for js libraries and plugins.
